00028 //:
00029 // This class keeps a cache of various topology object lists
00030 
00031 class vtol_topology_cache : public vul_timestamp
00032 {
00033   //: private default constructor
00034   vtol_topology_cache();
00035   //: private constructor

00069   //members

00071

00076   vcl_vector<vtol_face*>*  faces_;
